info.title: dbapi-onetimepasswords
info.description: One-Time Passwords API. Please also refer to the Transaction Authorization API which covers even more use cases.

get.summary: This service returns the customers one-time-password challenge methods.
get.description: This service provides an overview of one-time password challenge methods and their corresponding status.

parameters.name: Correlation-Id
parameters.description: Free form key controlled by the caller e.g. uuid

400.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 400. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: Unable to identify transaction by Id.
Booking date from must precede booking date to.
Invalid value for 'sortBy'. Valid values are 'bookingDate[ASC]' and 'bookingDate[DESC]'.
it seems that you started a non pushTAN challenge. Please use the PATCH endpoint to continue
it seems that you started a pushTAN challenge. Please use the GET endpoint to continue
Order deletion/modification not allowed due to order state.
Multiple positions exist. Please contact your personal bank advisor.
The order exceeds the maximum available quota: Free quota: {freeQuota}
Not enough securities with minimum holding period available
Ordering quotas of OEREFs (Open-Ended Real Estate Funds) bought after 21.07.2013 and cannot be returned
Ordering quotas of OEREFs (Open-Ended Real Estate Funds) bought partly after 21.07.2013 and cannot be returned
Customer is not allowed to order
Security Account is not valid for orders
ExpiryDate must be a business day
Setting a limit when ordering over the capital management company is not possible
Setting an expiry date when ordering over the capital management company is not possible
addOns.expiryDate not allowed with type of addOns.restriction
BestEx could not be retrieved for holding recommendation
No data for given wkn found
Mismatching ccy for the given security
Security not tradeable with market place
Best Execution stock market could not be determined

401.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 401. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: The requested function requires a SCA Level Authentication.

post.summary: Generate a one-time password challenge request.
post.description: This service generates a one-time password challenge request for the given method and transaction.

parameters.name: Correlation-Id
parameters.description: Free form key controlled by the caller e.g. uuid

requestBody.description: Input parameters to start a OTP challenge

location.description: URI of the created challenge resource

patch.summary: Reply to a one-time password challenge request.
patch.description: The service generates a one-time password token, if given the correct challenge response.

401.description: Unsuccessful operation, returns http status 401. See 'example' property for possible values.

example.message: The requested function requires a SCA Level Authentication.

requestType.description: The type of the OTP challenge to start.

requestData.description: object depending on requestType. E.g. SECURITIES_ORDER_ENTRY use model ChallengeRequestDataSecuritiesOrderEntry.

language.description: The language that should be used in customer facing texts created in the challenge process, i.e. SMS or photoTAN app. ISO-639-1 code.

id.description: the ID of the created challenge request

challenge.description: The sub-type of the response challenge. Depending on the value see swagger model ChallengeMethodMTAN or ChallengeMethodPHOTOTAN. This is actually a constrain of the swagger 2.0 spec.

mobilePhoneNumber.description: The telephone number the short message is being sent to

imageBase64.description: The base64 encoded PNG image that contains the challenge

response.description: The response code to the created challenge.

otp.description: The created one-time password. The password is valid once, for the current user, the provided request type and the current access_token only. The returned one-time password should be treated as random string, with no structure and semantic.

mobilePhoneNumber.description: The telephone number the short message is being sent to

activeDevicesCount.description: Number of active devices for this method type.

OrderActivityType.description:
SELL - an order to sell
BUY - an order to buy
PLACEMENT -
SUBSCRIPTION - an IPO order

limitPrice.description: The lowest price (for a buy) or highest price (for a sell) at which an order execution should be triggered.

expiryDate.description: The expiry date defines how long the order will be valid and the order can get executed in ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD

restriction.description: Use Order Restrictions to define specific price quote, if required. Please be aware of potential dependencies of the defined order type

ChallengeRequestDataTransferPartnerLegiD.description: challenge request data for requestType TRANSFER_PARTNER_LEGI_DATA

quantity.description: Quantity of orders to be traded

ChallengeRequestDataSecuritiesOrderEntry.description: challenge request data for requestType SECURITIES_ORDER_ENTRY

ChallengeRequestDataSecuritiesOrderModif.description: challenge request data for requestType SECURITIES_ORDER_MODIFY

ChallengeRequestDataSecuritiesOrderDelet.description: challenge request data for requestType SECURITIES_ORDER_DELETE

amountValue.description: value of the money transfer in given currency

ChallengeRequestDataInstantSepaCreditTra.description: challenge request data for requestType INSTANT_SEPA_CREDIT_TRANSFERS

message.description: Description of the belonging error code.

messageId.description: dbAPI internal message-id (unique identifier) that allow reference to each of your API calls.

scopes.read_partners_legi: Grants read access to legitimation data of the current partner/customer. This data is only available for natural persons. Legitimation data contains information, e.g. about the document type, document number and document issue date for the given customer.
scopes.instant_sepa_credit_transfers: Initiate and check status of instant SEPA credit transfers
scopes.openid: Request access to OpenId Connect functionality
